verbose_text: However, an inflammation associated role of the SphK / S1P pathway remains controversial, as other authors have demonstrated that S1P can reduce inflammatory signals in cultured renal mesangial cells by downregulating prostaglandin E2 synthesis and the expression of pro inflammatory mediators, such as cytokine triggered secretory phospholipase A2 and inducible nitric oxide (NO) synthase.
evidence: downregulating prostaglandin E2 synthesis and the expression of pro-inflammatory mediators, such as cytokine-triggered secretory phospholipase A2 and inducible nitric oxide (NO
